channel.title: PI Donator resets when log out
channel.description: Sup guys, whenever i give myself donator and relog it goes away. how can i fix this?

item.title: PI Donator resets when log out
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

I’ll assume you’re on a Windows computer.
http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-vista/show-or-hide-file-name-extensions
Then go to character files and see what type of files they are.

Read full topic
item.source: PI Donator resets when log out

item.title: PI Donator resets when log out
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“shank beast, post:15, topic:521949”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=640457.msg4316262#msg4316262 date=1371524290]
Mm, what format are character files saved on your server? Is it raw text?
[/quote]
I saved through eclispe and notepadd++ so, idk. :([/quote]
how do you not know the file type of a document you save and edit?

Read full topic

item.title: PI Donator resets when log out
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

Null Amount:

Post the code where it shows you what the server saves when a player logs out.

allinthis http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/276430-pi-how-add-ranks-stuff-like-donator.html

Read full topic

item.source: PI Donator resets when log out

item.title: PI Donator resets when log out
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

DAn0194:

Post your givedonor command

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“givedonar”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerTodonar)) {
Server.playerHandler.players[i].isDonator = 1;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: PI Donator resets when log out

item.title: PI Donator resets when log out
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:521949”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=640457.msg4316025#msg4316025 date=1371497770]

followed this, (did make correction to some errors, for isdonator, i put public int isdonator;)

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/276430-pi-how-add-ranks-stuff-like-donator.html

That doesn’t tell us anything.
We need to see your code. Not the code you followed.

That’s the code he used, what else do you want him to show??

OT: have you checked your char file if isDonator variable is there?

[/quote]
Just because it’s the code he used, doesn’t mean he added it correctly. Thus why I want to see his.[/quote]

It spoonfed every location, if you couldn’t do that correctly you’re messed up

Read full topic
